DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare satisfaction ( LQI questionnaire , factor I : treatment interference ) PID patient receive subcutaneous injection Gammanorm® 165 mg/mL accord delivery device .
DOC.brief_title: Gammanorm Quality Life Study Immunodeficient Patients Using Rapid Push Pumps
DOC.criteria: Adult patient ( ≥ 18 year ) Presenting primary immunodeficiency Having receive subcutaneous injection immunoglobulin home use automatic pump least 1 month time inclusion For investigator decides maintain immunoglobulin replacement therapy subcutaneous injection Gammanorm® 165 mg/mL home Having sign informed consent form Patient currently participate another interventional study time inclusion
